data.event: The town is named after Hastings Curtiss, a prominent citizen and member of the State Assembly in 1824.
Hastings was the first town settled in Oswego County when Oliver Stevens built a rude house near the abandoned Fort Brewerton in 1789.
The town was formed in 1825 from Constantia.
